channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Former Supreme Court Justice David Souter, a Republican who became a liberal darling, dies at 85
item.description: Retired Supreme Court Justice David H. Souter has died at age 85. The ascetic bachelor and New Hampshire Republican became a darling of liberals during his nearly 20 years on the bench.

item.title: Catholic Chicagoans celebrate as native son Pope Leo XIV becomes first American pope
Leo XIV’s brother recalls feeling of ‘disbelief’ over his sibling becoming pope
